column2:
"Hey, <%me>.
It's been a while, hasn't it? I'm glad to see that you've been getting along well."
"Oh, that's right. Thanks to Xiera's efforts, the ARKS ships have become almost fully autonomous."
"After handing over control, I've found myself with a lot more free time. So I've spent my time running calculations about the distant future."
"Calculations are all there is for you to do?"
"Where is Xiera anyways?"
"Haha. Don't look so worried. This is a future woven by the wishes of all people. I could never get bored with it."
"Oh, Xiera went out for a bit. She seemed to have some things she wanted to do, but she should be calling back any moment right about now."
"Xiao, this is Xiera! I'm here to deliver a report on the interviews!"
"Today's theme is \"Improving work-friendly environments for the women of ARKS\"!"
"Ah, feel free to listen in if you want, <%me>!"
"This is something Xiera started up recently. She said she wanted more freedom to go out and gather the opinions of everyone in ARKS."
"Ulc and I are of the same mind, actually. It's important for an organization to really consider the opinions of its subjects."
"Well, here's my report! First, a perspective from the lovely Sara."
"\"Be more thankful for my concerns! Also, stop patting my head!\""
"Ah, I see. Denied. I'll be sure to show more thanks for her concern, but I'm still going to pat her on the head."
"Moving on, a perspective from our beloved Guardian Matoi."
"\"I want to keep protecting everyone's happiness. So long as I can do that, I'll be fine.\""
"Yes, I see. Not exactly relevant to the question theme, but a very Matoi response indeed. Who's next?"
"\"Promotion of information dealers! Also, praise Patty for being awesome!\""
"And beside her, a sighing Tea."
"Peculiarities aside, I'm actually kind of interested in what would happen if Patty and Tea were recruited into the Intelligence Division."
"And that's all for today! While I'm here, I also have my own input! With regard to female Cast chest-parts..."
"Sorry, Xiera! Went and slipped my hand and disconnected you, I did. Haha."
"So yeah, as you can see ARKS is carrying on quite peacefully, isn't it?"
"Peaceful everyday life... Quite the miracle you were destined to bring about, I'll say."
"But I wonder every now and then... Didn't all the other miracles we had in the past just lead us down a path of ruin?"
"Even a miracle like Xion only led to another repeat of conflict and tragedy. Because apparently that was the \"correct\" history."
"Ahaha. Don't give me such a grim look. Sorry, I went and said something untoward."
"Any future is going to be a path we all walk down together, you know. Whatever changes may come about, that's the \"miracle\" I'm hoping for."
